name: Shaymin Prism Star
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.

attacks.name: Flower Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of basic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
